doc:
Harold Gould https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Gould 0 Harold Vernon Gould (December 10, 1923 – September 11, 2010) was an American character actor. He appeared as Martin Morgenstern on the sitcom Rhoda (1974–78) and Miles Webber on the sitcom The Golden Girls (1989–92). A five-time Emmy Award nominee, Gould acted in film and television for nearly 50 years, appearing in more than 300 television shows, 20 major motion pictures, and over 100 stage plays. He was known for playing elegant, well-dressed men (as in The Sting), and he regularly played Jewish characters and grandfather-type figures on television and in film. Harold_Vernon_Gould ( December_10_,_1923 – September_11_,_2010 ) was an_American_character_actor . He appeared as Martin_Morgenstern on the_sitcom Rhoda_(_1974 – 78_) and Miles_Webber on the_sitcom The_Golden_Girls_(_1989 – 92_) . A_five-time_Emmy_Award_nominee , Gould acted in film_and_television for nearly_50_years , appearing in more_than_300_television_shows , 20_major_motion_pictures , and over 100_stage_plays . He was_known for playing elegant_,_well-dressed_men ( as in The_Sting_) , and he regularly played Jewish_characters and grandfather-type_figures on television and in film .
